title: The King of the Crags
description: Prince Jehal killed his way to the top, but cannot enjoy the throne. He feels too much for the wife he married for power. His lover knows. Out in the realms, loyalists to the old regime plot. Red Riders herald revolution. And where is the White Dragon, recovered from taming alchemical liquid that blocks memories of when dragons ruled -- and the world burned?
author: Stephen Deas
